name: Happy Fields
description:
" Aww... Country life ! Taking time, enjoying nature... What a good idea, this new job in the fields ! " " Well... Forget it ! "  

You're the new harvester operator at Happy Fields Inc. It's time to take control of your machine, complete your tasks and become the king of productivity. 

But beware... This new world of intensive agriculture is merciless ! 

Master the Great Field-o-matic !

The "super productive agricultural treadmill of the future" is easy to use, hard to master (as usual). Be quick enough, the fall is fatal.

Try not to be late and not to damage fields that are not requested. Otherwise, the treadmill may speed up... 

Make your way through the fields

Balance the needs of your missions with those of your survival. It's the key to your success ! (one of them, anyway...)

Don't forget to grab bonuses... and use them wisely ! They can save you.

Free demo content
  • Full tutorial (3 missions)
  • Standard level with limited distance
